title: EDIT-Bench: Evaluating LLM Abilities to Perform Real-World Instructed Code Edits
data:

title: Explainable C/C++ vulnerability detection
data:
Z Huang, A Aumpansub, S Shaik- International Journal of Information and Computer, 2025
Detecting software vulnerabilities in C/C++ code is critical for ensuring software 
security. In this paper, we explore the use of neural networks to detect vulnerabilities 
using program slices that capture syntactic and semantic information. Our approach
author: Thanh Le-Cong
